name: elpwbi

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Membership in a power set, biconditional. (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 17-Jul-2022.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 16-Sep-2022.)
